tour_guide.steps.start.title: Ready to harness the full power of artificial intelligence within Pernod Ricard?
tour_guide.steps.start.content: Welcome to Pernod Ricard GPT tour guide. It will go through main features of this solution.
tour_guide.steps.model_selection.title: Models
tour_guide.steps.model_selection.content: Pernod Ricard GPT provides several models to generate text, images and even ask questions to documents. GPT-4 Vision integrates text and image comprehension for seamless content analysis and generation.
tour_guide.steps.new_conversation.title: New conversation
tour_guide.steps.new_conversation.conten: You may start a new conversation by clicking on this button. Conversation history will appear below this area.
tour_guide.steps.start_discussion.title: Start a discussion
tour_guide.steps.start_discussion.conten: You can input your question in the below and validate with enter or click on the button. Answers will appear from top to down.
tour_guide.steps.history.title: History
tour_guide.steps.history.content: This is your chat history! You can find every conversation you had here. It will allow you to retrieve previous responses from the different models you used.
tour_guide.steps.explore_all_application: This is where you can find all of the custom applications hosted on PR GPT. Feel free to browse through them and try them!
tour_guide.steps.prompt_bank.title: Prompt bank
tour_guide.steps.prompt_bank.content: This is your prompt bank. Soon, you will have a dedicated tour guide to help you understand how to use them or even create some, tailored to your needs. You can simply click on a prompt to launch it immediately.
tour_guide.steps.create_new_prompt.title: Create a new prompt
tour_guide.steps.create_new_prompt.conte: This is where you can create your own new prompts ! Store them in dedicated folders to keep your prompt bank well organized!
tour_guide.steps.applications.title: Applications
tour_guide.steps.applications.content: Pernod Ricard GPT hosts different custom applications! By clicking here you may start a new conversation, pin or take out the application from the left side bar.
tour_guide.button.start_quick_tour.label: Start a quick tour
